comment._content: Typo in summary note.  "solider" should be soldier"

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: www.rootsweb.ancestry.com/~mdannear/firstfam/dorsey/b5432... says :Rebecca Hanson DORSEY and Col. CSA George Riggs GAITHER were married on 7 Aug 1851." www.mytrees.com/ancestry/Maryland/Died-1916/Do/Dorsey-fam... indicates they had 7 children. See also history-sites.com/cgi-bin/bbs53x/vacwmb/webbbs_config.pl?... www.msa.md.gov/megafile/msa/speccol/sc3500/sc3520/001500/... has biographies for this George Riggs Gaither and his father. His son became Attorney General for Maryland [ www.msa.md.gov/msa/speccol/sc3500/sc3520/001500/001511/ht... ]
